description: Presently working in this organization as a front end developer. It is a wireless communication based organization.
Worked as a front end developer. It is a wireless communication based organization.

I have worked around 2.8 years in this organization as a front end developer and UI/UX developer. I have gained a lot of experience, knowledge and of course an unforgettable moments with friends.Awesome company to work with. I suggest this company for freshers who could explore new technologies and enrich their knowledge and experience.
